relation: Hanging out with friends and studying can be more fun then people think, grab a pizza and get to studying.
Very easy to understand professors and helpful.
Get there early and enroll so that you can pick the classes you would like to take.

Rogers State University is a great college, and everyone you meet is very friendly. Enrolling is extremely easy and their staff is very helpful through the whole process. I would recommend anyone to Rogers State University.
pageTitle: Rogers State University (RSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {45809=Sit outside and watch the smokers or go play on the soccer field, but not past 10:00 pm, you will get a write up and a fine., 116408=If you prefer a more quiet dorm experience then this school is perfect. With only two dorm buildings not a lot of students live on campus but events are thrown on campus enough for you to get involved. The dorm I currently live in is only two years old and more of a suite than a traditional dorm setup. The campus is also preparing to make even another dorm and it will be finished by fall 2015., 56640=Most universities have restaurants and plenty of seating. The cafeteria at Rogers State is more like a small convenient store and has enough seating for about 50 people. It is actually located inside a building that has classrooms and the campus bookstore. The required meal plan is only $1500 a semester but has minimal choices. Most people would rather opt out of the meal plan completely and see it as a waste of money. They are hoping to build a new cafeteria in the future that includes more choices and is set up in a restaurant style., 125569=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 115740=The current cafÃ© in the campuses Centennial Center is the only dining area at the moment, but it still is awesome yet overpriced on some items, but the food is always delicious and the sodexo workers do a great job everyday. The campus is towards the end of construction of the new dining hall building which will be done at the end of the current semester. Spring2014.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Rosonna from Delaware, OK 06/18/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 33 Categories Comments Great for these types of students I've been in classes with so many non-trads, older returning women, older returning men, young a.p. students, fresh out of high school, country kids, goths and people of every gender, culture, race and ethnicity, class, background, etc. The shy awkward freshman is totally comfortable grouping with the older returning female recovering addict and the cheerleader and the cowboy. Lol! But I've really seen it happen....very comfortably. Tips for prospective students Relax! It's a really warm, friendly. laid-back relaxed atmosphere. Don't catastrophize. Nothing's ever really as bad as you imagine it will be. I promise these instructors will work with you if you have academic, or even personal issues interferring with your academics. They will give you every benefit of the doubt and talk you through whatever is bothering you. Bang for the buck
